segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to end up on the wet floor if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this; it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy is still reaching higher.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t pull the whole shelf down with him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
